All subject meet screen criterion receive IV anidulafungin . Subjects stratify age ( 1 month - < 2 year ; 2 year - < 5 year ; 5 year - < 18 year ) . Subjects may switch oral fluconazole , provide pre-specified criterion meet . Subjects microbiologically confirm ICC must minimum total treatment duration 14 day . The maximum allowed treatment duration anidulafungin 35 day ; maximum total treatment duration study 49 day . At select center , anidulafungin pharmacokinetics assess first 6 subject age 1 month - < 2 year confirm recommend dosage regimen . A population PK-PD analysis perform enrolled subject .
